scripts.first-deploy: cd server && yarn install --immutable && yarn migrate && psql $DATABASE_URL -f src/infra/database/scripts/001-load-establishments_com_epci_reg_dep.sql -v filePath=src/infra/database/data/common/com_epci_dep_reg.csv && psql $DATABASE_URL -f src/infra/database/scripts/002-load-establishments_direction_territoriale.sql -v filePath=src/infra/database/data/common/direction_territoriale.csv && psql $DATABASE_URL -f src/infra/database/scripts/003-load-establishment_kinds.sql -v filePath=src/infra/database/data/common/nature_juridique.csv && psql $DATABASE_URL -f src/infra/database/scripts/004-load-data.sql -v filePath=src/infra/database/data/dummy/dummy_data.csv -v dateFormat="'MM/DD/YY'" && psql $DATABASE_URL -f src/infra/database/scripts/006-load-locality-taxes.sql -v filePath=src/infra/database/data/common/taxe.csv && yarn seed
